---
title: "Predicting house price data using Yelp/Zillow data"
output: 
  github_document:
    pandoc_args: --webtex
--- 

The most general specification of the model is 
$$
    P_{bzy}=f(Star_{bzy},Review_{bzy})
$$
where

- $P_{zy}$- Zillow dataset
- $Star_{zy}$- Review dataset
- $Review_{zy}$- Review dataset

and $z$ is zipcode, $y$ is the year

The simplest specification is 

\begin{equation}
    P_{bzy}=\alpha + \beta_1 \times Star_{bzy} + \beta_2 \times Review_{bzy}
\end{equation}
